overview: HoldMyTicket offers a full range of tools for ticketing and promoting events. We provide our clients with reliable and secure box office solutions with innovative ways to handle ticketing. HoldMyTicketâ€™s mobile software puts the traditional box office window into a small handheld device that can collect entry fees on the spot while also scanning and validating pre-sold, print-at-home tickets. Our software offers real-time reports of box office data including up-to-date ticket sales, ticket validations, calendar statistics, buyer demographics and much more. HoldMyTicket clients include theatres, sports, event promoters, festivals, coffee shops, bars, state fairs, schools, museums, etc. Our service integrates directly into third party websites giving our clients the power to have an up-to-date event calendar with online ticketing. We give promoters and event coordinators the ability to oversee events and ticket sales with a powerful web application.
